item.title: 巴格曼房地产投资信托基金据称寻求在印度IPO中获得39亿美元估值
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团支持的Bagmane Prime Office REIT正准备最早于下月启动首次公开募股，寻求约39亿美元的估值。【原文：Blackstone-backed Bagmane Prime Office REIT is preparing to launch an initial public offering as soon as next month, seeking a valuation of about $3.9 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达财报临近，成为痴迷人工智能的股市风险因素
item.description: 英伟达公司周三下午发布的财报正值美国股市的关键时刻，投资者对人工智能前景的担忧日益加剧。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s earnings report on Wednesday afternoon comes at a critical time for the US stock market with investors increasingly nervous about the outlook for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 经济学家称拉加德将提前离任，欧洲央行行长职位将移交诺特
item.description: 据彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，克里斯蒂娜·拉加德预计将在任期结束前离开欧洲央行，为克拉斯·克诺特接任行长铺平道路。【原文：Christine Lagarde is expected to leave the European Central Bank before her term ends, paving the way for Klaas Knot to succeed her as president, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 奥美集团罕见进军欧洲债券市场
item.description: 营销与企业传播公司奥美集团在公布季度财报及大规模股票回购计划数日后，时隔两年再度发行欧元债券。【原文：Marketing and corporate communications firm Omnicom is raising euro currency debt for the first time in two years, days after announcing quarterly earnings and a sizable share buyback】

item.title: 孟加拉国央行行长政府更迭后突然辞职
item.description: 孟加拉国央行行长突然辞职，距离该国民主选举产生的新政府就职仅一周有余。【原文：The head of Bangladesh’s central bank has stepped down in a surprise departure that comes just over a week after the inauguration of the country’s new democratically elected government.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称乌克兰袭击阿克隆氮肥厂致四人死亡
item.description: 俄罗斯称乌克兰实施了一次夜间无人机袭击，导致斯摩棱斯克州一家氮肥厂受损，并造成四名员工死亡。【原文：Russia said Ukraine carried out an overnight drone strike that damaged a nitrogen fertilizer plant and killed four of its employees in the Smolensk region.】

item.title: 菲律宾长途电话公司寻求在美国和菲律宾为其金融科技子公司Maya上市
item.description: 菲律宾电信公司高管表示，PLDT公司计划将其金融科技子公司Maya同时在美国和菲律宾上市，海外公开募股可能在今年进行。【原文：PLDT Inc. plans to list its financial-technology unit Maya both in the US and in the Philippines, with the public offer overseas possible this year, according to the Philippine telecommunication company’s top executive.】

item.title: 沙特油轮巨头巴赫里公司趁运价逼近每日20万美元之际大举购入船舶
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的石油运输商已临时租用至少五艘超级油轮，在租船成本飙升之际进一步推高了对这类巨型船舶的需求。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s biggest oil shipper provisionally hired at least five supertankers, adding to demand for the giant ships at a time when their booking costs are soaring.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳央行预计今年通胀将放缓
item.description: 博茨瓦纳央行行长莱塞戈·莫塞基表示，由于"汇率动态趋于稳定"，该国今年通胀率将达到略高于5%的峰值，低于去年12月预测的6.2%。【原文：Botswana’s inflation will peak at just over 5% this year, down from a December forecast of 6.2%, due to “stabilizing exchange-rate dynamics”, Bank of Botswana Governor Lesego Moseki said.】

item.title: 日本反垄断监管机构就Azure云服务对微软旗下公司展开调查
item.description: 日本监管机构正就微软日本子公司涉嫌涉及Azure云平台的反竞争行为展开调查。【原文：Japanese regulators are investigating Microsoft Corp.’s local unit over possible anti-competitive practices involving the Azure cloud platform.】

item.title: Haleon业绩下滑，因流感季疲软拖累年末销售
item.description: Haleon Plc股价创近一年最大跌幅，因2025年销售额增长低于预期——流感季节不景气导致其非处方药购买量减少。【原文：Haleon Plc slid the most in nearly one year after sales grew less than expected in 2025, as a weak cold and flu season meant fewer customers purchased its over-the-counter medicines.】

item.title: 新加坡银行从亚洲富豪手中吸纳610亿美元新财富
item.description: 新加坡三大银行去年合计吸纳了770亿新元（610亿美元）的新净财富资金，地缘政治紧张局势和贸易不确定性促使亚洲富豪将更多资产转移至这个城市国家。【原文：Singapore’s three biggest banks pulled in a combined S$77 billion ($61 billion) in net new wealth money last year as geopolitical tensions and trade uncertainty pushed Asia’s rich to move more assets to the city-state.】

item.title: 赞比亚通胀率降至目标区间速度快于预期
item.description: 赞比亚年度通胀率近七年来首次跌破央行设定的目标上限，这为进一步降息提供了依据。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate fell below the central bank’s target ceiling for the first time in almost seven years, bolstering the case for further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 阿拉食品公司斥资3.5亿美元投资奶酪业务，创下历史最高投资纪录
item.description: 北欧最大乳品企业阿尔拉食品安巴公司将进行史上最大规模投资，斥资约3亿欧元（合3.5亿美元）扩大奶酪生产。【原文：Arla Foods Amba, Northern Europe’s largest dairy company, will make its biggest investment ever, spending about €300 million ($350 million) to expand cheese production.】

item.title: 分析师称泰铢升值是意外降息的驱动因素之一
item.description: 分析师指出，泰铢走强可能是泰国央行意外降息决策背后的因素之一。【原文：The Thai Baht’s strength is likely among factors underpinning the Bank of Thailand’s unexpected decision to lower interest rates, according to analysts.】

item.title: 俄罗斯和伊朗大幅削减对华油价，海上原油库存持续攀升
item.description: 俄罗斯和伊朗石油生产商正提供更大幅度的折扣，以争夺同一批有限的中国买家，此前印度已退出采购。【原文：Russian and Iranian oil producers are offering deepening discounts as they compete for the same limited group of Chinese buyers after India retreated from purchases.】

item.title: 据称，李嘉诚旗下博达科技正洽谈收购MoneyHero
item.description: 知情人士透露，博力特控股有限公司正洽谈收购纳斯达克上市公司MoneyHero有限公司，此举将促成两家由亿万富翁李嘉诚支持的金融科技公司合并。【原文：Bolttech Holdings Ltd. is in talks to buy Nasdaq-listed MoneyHero Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, a move that would combine two financial technology firms backed by billionaire Richard Li.】

item.title: 香港将首次动用40年来未曾启用的联系汇率制度储备基金
item.description: 香港正计划40年来首次动用确保其货币挂钩制度稳定的基金，部分用于资助在与内地交界处建设科技枢纽。【原文：Hong Kong is planning for the first time in 40 years to tap the fund that ensures the stability of its currency peg, in part to help finance the development of a technology hub on the border with China.】

item.title: 韩国通过另一项改革法案，推动股东价值提升
item.description: 韩国国会批准了一项争议已久的法律修订案，要求企业注销库存股。这是政府推动完善公司治理、提升股市估值的关键举措。【原文：South Korea’s parliament approved a long-debated legal revision requiring companies to cancel treasury shares, a key step in the government’s drive to improve corporate governance and boost stock market valuations.】

item.title: 新日铁39亿美元交易点燃日本可转换债券市场
item.description: 日本制钢所创纪录的可转换债券发行凸显了日本企业寻求比日益昂贵的传统债务更低成本融资的趋势，这为更多此类交易铺平了道路。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp.’s record-breaking convertible bond offering is highlighting the quest of Japanese companies for cheaper funding than increasingly expensive traditional debt, which sets the stage for more such deals.】

item.title: 香港力推离岸人民币业务 吸引更多借款人
item.description: 香港正积极吸引更多人民币借款人，并扩大人民币交易产品种类，官员们借势推动去美元化趋势，同时配合中国建设全球人民币的战略布局。【原文：Hong Kong is seeking to attract more yuan borrowers and expand trading products in the Chinese currency, as officials capitalize on de‑dollarization trends and China’s push to build a global yuan.】

item.title: 印度债券银行家敦促监管机构提供更多融资灵活性
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度专门从事企业债务证券销售的银行家正向金融监管机构申请允许以债券为抵押借款，而监管机构本身也在寻求深化本地资本市场。【原文：Indian bankers that specialize in selling corporate debt securities are asking the financial regulator for permission to borrow funds against bonds, according to people familiar with the matter, as authorities themselves seek to deepen local capital markets.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克斥资9.5亿美元收购高血压药物
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司同意收购生物技术公司35Pharma Inc.，该公司拥有一种早期阶段的高血压药物。此次收购标志着这家英国制药公司正向心血管药物领域拓展业务。【原文：GSK Plc agreed to buy 35Pharma Inc., a biotech with an early-stage high blood pressure drug, as the UK pharmaceutical company expands into cardiovascular medicine.】

item.title: 肯尼亚管道公司首次公开募股认购超额，顾问称
item.description: 肯尼亚国有管道公司首次公开募股已达成1063亿先令（8.241亿美元）的融资目标，这是该东非国家十余年来首次进行此类出售。【原文：Kenya has reached its target 106.3 billion shillings ($824.1 million) from the initial public offering of its state-run pipeline company, the first such sale for the East African nation in more than a decade.】

item.title: DoorDash将退出四个亚洲国家，因竞争加剧
item.description: DoorDash公司正退出亚洲四个国家，这表明激烈的竞争和微薄的利润正对其海外扩张计划构成压力。【原文：DoorDash Inc. is pulling out of four countries in Asia, a sign that fierce competition and thin margins across food delivery are weighing on its overseas ambitions.】

item.title: 肯尼亚央行在连续十次降息后释放进一步宽松信号
item.description: 肯尼亚央行行长卡马乌·图格表示，在过去一年半时间里，该行已十次下调基准利率以刺激经济增长，目前仍有进一步降息空间。【原文：Kenya’s central bank still has room to cut its benchmark interest rate after lowering it 10 times in the past one and a half years to help spur economic growth, according to Governor Kamau Thugge.】

item.title: 香港2026年度预算案的赢家与输家
item.description: 随着香港政府加速推动人工智能在各行业的应用，该市的科技与金融企业有望从政府的支出计划中获益。【原文：Hong Kong’s technology and financial companies are poised to benefit from the city’s spending plan as the government accelerates artificial intelligence adoption across sectors.】

item.title: 铂金价格飙升后，Valterra股息超出预期
item.description: 瓦尔特拉铂金有限公司宣布的股息远超分析师预期，因去年金属价格飙升推动其盈利大幅增长。【原文：Valterra Platinum Ltd. declared a dividend that smashed analyst expectations as earnings jumped last year on soaring metals prices.】

item.title: 匈牙利反对派扩大领先优势 奥尔班民调支持率崩塌
item.description: 匈牙利反对党蒂萨党在周三公布的一项民调中显示，在近期一系列丑闻后，该党在已决定投票的选民中对总理维克托·奥尔班领导的执政党民盟的领先优势扩大至前所未有的20个百分点。【原文：The Hungarian opposition Tisza party has widened its lead against Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s ruling Fidesz to an unprecedented 20 percentage points among decided voters after a series of recent scandals, a poll showed Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国能源账单跌至近两年低点 绿色成本改革引发震动
item.description: 英国能源账单将于4月降至近两年最低水平，此前政府将部分可再生能源补贴成本从家庭账单转移至一般税收。【原文：UK energy bills will drop to the lowest in almost two years in April, after the government moved part of the cost of supporting renewable energy from household bills to general taxation.】
